As an electrical engineer, you understand the power behind complex systems. That knowledge is key when it comes to designing new methods of communications that leverage machine learning. We're looking for an electrical engineer who can use their skills to develop and verify new approaches to traditional communications methodology to help the team modernize the world of communications.Our team builds software that focuses on combining machine learning with traditional communications theory. That's why we need you, an electrical engineer, who specializes in radio frequency design and wireless communications, to help us design and develop new capabilities for machine learning software based upon radio frequency theory. You'll work with a team of both software developers and electrical engineers specializing in wireless communications to develop and verify new approaches, which leverage machine learning, to traditional communications methodology. You'll directly impact government customers by helping the team create a product that can modernize the field of communications. We'll look to you to share your electrical engineering expertise through leadership and mentoring junior staff. This is a chance to use your experience-based knowledge in wireless communications and RF theory while broadening your skillset into areas like software development and machine learning frameworks.
